subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Picking up someone named Steve on Ghost Box 23L
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_665d_53da_2329
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I added an AM random sweep segment to my folders, that has the audio limiter 
removed, so there's something ot compare to. With no AGC, there's a 
significant reduction in noise.  BTW, at about 8-9 second "Chris--go shake". 
The AGC is between the nmic amplifiers, and line out, which also feeds the 
monitor speaker.

Frank
